The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 October is 669,973 (1,190.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 17 October, there were 98,381 new confirmed cases (174.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 October, there were 91,686 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% ( 6,695 extra cases).
